Package cs3822

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
cs3822.Grid
public class Grid extends Object
Representation of the 2048 grid, in which nodes reside.
Author:
Daniil Kuznetsov

  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid(String map, int winCondition, float twoProb, boolean generate) throws InvalidMapSizeException
      Constructor for the grid object.
      Parameters:
      map - String representation of the grid to construct
      winCondition - Target value for the game to achieve
      twoProb - Probability of generating a 2, the rest is probability of generating a 4
      generate - True if the two starting nodes should be generated
      Throws:
      InvalidMapSizeException

    • Grid

      public Grid(List<Node> nodes, int columnSize, int rowSize, int winCondition, float twoProb)
      Alternate grid copy constructor.
      Parameters:
      nodes - Array of Node objects
      columnSize - Width of the grid
      rowSize - Height of the grid
      winCondition - Target value for the game to achieve
      twoProb - Probability of generating a 2, the rest is probability of generating a 4

    • Grid

      public Grid(Grid grid)
      Grid copy constructor.
